494260.name: Army Gals - Soundtrack
494260.description:
The complete original 25 track soundtrack for Army Gals by Sam L. Jones

  • 2. Happy Army 1
  • 3. Happy 2
  • 4. Tense Army Situation
  • 5. Emotional Sad
  • 6. Army Action!
  • 7. Tension of a Long Fight
  • 8. Sexual Tension 1
  • 9. Sexual Tension 2
  • 10. Intimate Time 1
  • 11. Intimate Morning 2
  • 12. Character 1
  • 13. Character Theme 2 - A Loving Nature
  • 14. Character Theme 3
  • 15. Character Theme 4 - Elegant
  • 16. Romantic Morning After
  • 17. Briefing Time! Mission on!
  • 18. Happy Day Beat 1
  • 19. Happy Day Beat 2
  • 20. Calm Night In

  • 23. Salute After Battle!
